Translations.Text: radu biey yekunu me`a-lhavalifi vetubi`a `ala kulubihim fehum la yefkahun
lakini-rrasulu vellezine amenu me`ahu cahedu biemvalihim veenfusihim. veulaike lehumu-lhayrat. veulaike humu-lmuflihun
e`adde-llahu lehum cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha. zalike-lfevzu-l`azim
vecae-lmu`azzirune mine-l'a`rabi liyu'zene lehum veka`ade-llezine kezebu-llahe verasuleh. seyusibu-llezine keferu minhum `azabun elim
leyse `ale-ddu`afai vela `ale-lmerda vela `ale-llezine la yecidune ma yunfikune haracun iza nesahu lillahi verasulih. ma `ale-lmuhsinine min sebilin. vellahu gafurur rahim
vela `ale-llezine iza ma etevke litahmilehum kulte la ecidu ma ahmilukum `aleyh. tevellev vea`yunuhum tefidu mine-ddem`i hazenen ella yecidu ma yunfikun
inneme-ssebilu `ale-llezine yeste'zinuneke vehum agniya'. radu biey yekunu me`a-lhavalifi vetabe`a-llahu `ala kulubihim fehum la ya`lemun
